text: The Orlando Magic are an American professional basketball team in the National Basketball Association (NBA) in Orlando, Florida. They began playing in 1989. They play their home games at the Kia Center. They are the only team in the "big four" sports leagues to be based in Orlando. Steve Clifford is the current owner of the team. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:National Basketball Association teams Category:Sports in Orlando, Florida Category:Richard DeVos Category:1989 establishments in the United States Category:1980s establishments in Florida Category:Sports organizations based in Florida
title: Orlando Magic
